string.value: The Dark Lord says that he has another little problem...
Heed the Dark Lord's request to eliminate the #bStumps#k in order to gain his trust. A good place to find Stumps is in the Thief Training Center at the Kerning City Construction Site.
You solved the Dark Lord's problem and gained more of his trust.

string.name: summary
string.value: Enter the Thief Training Center through #bPower B. Fore#k at the #bKerning City Construction Site#k and eliminate the Stumps.
Oh, and do you think you can do one more favor for me? The #bStumps#k are starting to cause some problems. They are typically docile, but once in a while they get themselves into trouble.

Can you take care of the Stumps for me? If you go to the #bKerning City Construction Site#k, you'll be able to meet an instructor named #bPower B. Fore#k. He helps train low-level thieves. You can meet the #bStumps#k by entering the Thief Training Center through him.
I was just starting to feel comfortable with you. Now, I am quite disappointed.
Have you taken care of them already? You are stronger than I expected.
I look forward to your future development. Please continue to work on behalf of the thieves.
It looks like you haven't taken care of the #bStumps#k yet. Is this too difficult of a job for you?
